articles.title: Argentina government loses Senate power after senators exit coalition
articles.description: Argentina's ruling Peronist coalition was dealt a blow on Wednesday when four of its senators announced their departure, weakening the government's sway in the Senate just eight months before high-stakes general elections.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Feb 22 (Reuters) - Argentina's ruling Peronist coalition was dealt a blow on Wednesday when four of its senators announced their departure, weakening the government's sway in the Senate just eight months before high-stakes general elect... [1242 chars]

articles.description: Emiliano Martinez made headlines for the right and wrong reasons during the World Cup, with his penalty shootout antics slammed as "despicable" following Argentina's final victory over France
articles.content:

articles.content:
